009package imagingbook.core.plugin;
010
011import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.PACKAGE;
012import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.TYPE;
013import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME;
014//import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.SOURCE;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
017import java.lang.annotation.Target;
018
019/**
020 * Annotation to specify the menu path (tree branch) of the associated plugin class
021 * or an entire plugin package. Takes a {@link String} argument e.g.,
022 * <pre>
023 * {@literal @}IjMenuPath("Plugins&gt;My Stuff")
024 * {@literal @}IjMenuEntry("My Plugin")
025 * public class My_Plugin implements PlugInFilter {
026 *   ...
027 * }</pre>
028 * May also be used on the {@code package} declaration 
029 * in file {@code package-info.java} to set the default menu
030 * path for all plugins directly contained in that package (but not nested), e.g.,
031 * <pre>
032 * {@literal @}IjMenuPath("Plugins&gt;Binary Regions")
033 * package Binary_Regions;</pre>
034 * Annotations for individual plugin classes override the package-level setting.
035 */
036@Retention(RUNTIME)
037@Target({ TYPE, PACKAGE })
038public @interface IjPluginPath {
039        public String value();
040}
